name: The Chase (itch) (BJ Games)
description:
"The Backrooms" was not necessarily the influence to this game, I have wanted to do something of this vein utilizing audio and liminal space for a long time, My previous project K-3462 touched on this quite a lot. However the release of "The Backrooms" has definitely pushed me to produce this game.

Four difficulties to complete, The Chase throws you into corridors and rooms with items to find to allow your escape (Pumpkins) and enemies to avoid along the way.

Instructions are built into the game and I hope you enjoy!
